# Administration {.unnumbered}

This section concerns administration of the Epi Unit, beginning with a regular calendar of meetings, events, and activities. It also includes procedures and checklists for on-boarding and off-boarding new or outgoing staff and contractors (e.g., CSTE Applied Epidemiology Fellows) as well as resources for current staff concerning hiring and interviewing. Also provided in this section are materials for applying for and administering grants, fellowships and other contractors.
